message: Added targeted discovery options and validated them against 169.254.123.6. Outputs dedupe with sweeps and serialize to JSON. Version bumped to 0.4.0 with clearer logs.

code_changes.changes: Added --cip-targets, --modbus-targets, --s7-targets handling; probe tags in extras; improved logs; version 0.4.0.

validation_runs.result_summary: CIP broadcast failed (macOS Errno 49/65), CIP unicast failed to connect, Modbus target succeeded (port 502 present), S7 target not present. JSON and stdout integrated.

data.notes: pycomm3 present; PROFINET libs unavailable on macOS which is expected.
